pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Build (2017, TV show)$(br2)Used by $(l:build/riders/blood_stalk)Blood Stalk$(/l), $(l:build/riders/night_rogue)Night Rogue$(/l), and $(l:build/riders/evol)Kamen Rider Evol$(/l)$(br2)Used to obtain Night Rogue's $(l:build/devices/transteam_gun_night_rogue)Transteam Gun (Night Rogue)$(/l)$(br2)Used with a $(l:build/items/lost_cobra_full_bottle)Lost Cobra Fullbottle$(/l) in your off-hand to obtain Blood Stalk's $(l:build/devices/transteam_gun_blood_stalk)Transteam Gun (Blood Stalk)$(/l)
